page.title: 14THE RAILWAY STATION
page.content: { Railway Station { ------- ------- In Station road there is{Clacton's railway station which was built in{ {1867 }and after 62 years of it being there,it was pulled down and another Railway Station was built, and opened on the {4th of November}1929.The Trains that you find at Clacton are 309,s 312,s 308,s 302,s.About two hundred trains come in,in two days.There are 10 to 13 coaches on a train and sometimes less. At Clacton there is a new train called the{Essex {Express.}It was new livery which is orange and brown,a bit like a Jaffa cake.The trains at Clacton are quite old,the East Essex Express is really a refurbished 309.There are 60 staff,excluding those who drive the Trains and the guards.
